description: This file defines a Next.js page component for displaying product details. It includes a static parameter generator for pre-rendering product IDs and a server component that fetches the product ID from params and renders a client-side component for product details.

methods.name: generateStaticParams
methods.description: Generates a small set of static product ID parameters for static site generation.

methods.name: ProductDetailPage
methods.description: A server-side React component that retrieves the product ID from parameters and renders the client-side product detail component.
